Accessing BusinessIQ

When you first navigate to the designated URL to access BusinessIQ (BIQ), you will encounter the login screen, where you can enter your User Name and Password:

 

 

If you have not yet received a user name and/or password, or if you encounter an error message when you attempt to login, you will need to contact either your help desk or your organization’s Sentrana support contact to continue.

If you have received a user name and password and are unable to login, click on the “Trouble logging in?” link. Select the appropriate option and enter your account email address and click Continue:

 

 

If you forgot your password, you will receive an email that contains a new BIQ generated random password. After you login, you can change your password from the options menu. If you forgot your user name, you will receive an email containing your BIQ user name.
